Book Specification.Title: "Building a Comprehensive Website"
Book Specification.Subtitle: "A Step-by-Step Guide to Creating a Professional Online Presence"

Goals/Outcomes: Provide a comprehensive guide to creating a website from scratch.
Cover all aspects of web development, including planning, design, coding, testing, and deployment.
Offer practical advice on how to create a professional online presence that attracts and engages visitors.
Help readers understand the technical and business aspects of building a successful website.
